ComicInfo.Summary:
There is a new designer drug on the streets, and it’s called Confection! It’s so powerful that it has to be baked into a culinary treat, and the abandoned Betty’s Bakery has been taken over by a gang of drug dealers! But by using a leftover box of seasoning containing the remaining ashes of Millard Findlemeyer, the gang has unwittingly unleashed that cookie of doom: GINGERDEAD MAN!
Variant Covers limited to 1,500 copies each!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Sergio Rios | 1 | Var | Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Dan Mendoza | 2 | Var | Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Masumi Max | missing |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-28 19:39:49. [CVDB517004]
ComicInfo.Characters: Billy Martinez, Gingerdead Man, Kayla Martinez
